custom-sql.sql: SELECT (CASE WHEN sum(researchobjectid) >0 THEN true ELSE false END ) as check FROM public.gfbio_project_researchobject WHERE researchobjectid = ? AND researchobjectversion = ?

SELECT gfbio_project_researchobject.projectid FROM public.gfbio_project_researchobject WHERE gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectid = ? and gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectversion = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, rank() OVER (PARTITION BY researchobjectid ORDER BY researchobjectversion DESC) AS pos FROM public.gfbio_researchobject WHERE researchobjectid in( SELECT gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectid FROM public.gfbio_project_researchobject WHERE gfbio_project_researchobject.projectid = ?) AND researchobjectversion in ( SELECT gfbio_project_researchobject.researchobjectversion FROM public.gfbio_project_researchobject WHERE gfbio_project_researchobject.projectid = ? ) )AS iq
WHERE pos=1
